system.description: Effect: The user gains @Affliction[choice-locked] 2. While @Affliction[choice-locked], the user does not consume PP. After these activations, the user is @Affliction[confused] 5.

actions.name: Outrage
actions.description: Effect: The user gains @Affliction[choice-locked] 2. While @Affliction[choice-locked], the user does not consume PP. After these activations, the user is @Affliction[confused] 5.
